topics.body:
"@orcinus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54852ea563687260301b0000#post_54852ea563687260301b0000
My Physics teacher (Toski can attest to this) was freaking terrible. He simply didn't teach. And I've heard stories about him where he literally made up our grades. 

Apparently, one student got 2 points taken off for a wrong answer, and took off 7 points for another student. When confronted about it, he said something along the lines of "life being unfair sometimes."

I barely passed that class. It was atrocious.
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200
